name: Coronavirus Info
author: SoftwareElites

sections.description:
This plugin displays the COVID-19 real-time data, top-headline news and finance impact, quantitative geographical mapping and forecasting through shortcodes like [covid19all] or [covid19usmap] in your WordPress post or page. The resultant post or page is mobile friendly.

This plugin is free to use. We are glad to able to join WordPress efforts alongside others in fighting against COVID-19. Feel free to share our website https://us-coronavirus.info/ with your friends and family.

Shortcode

  • [covid19all] shows everything we have, including real-time data, top-headline news and job impact, quantitative geographical mapping and forecasting.

  • [covid19data] shows real-time data for the whole world, the United States and all the counties in your state.

  • [covid19chart] shows historical plots for heavily-impacted countries in the whole world and heavily-impacted states in the United States.

  • [covid19news] shows top-headline coronavirus news.

  • [covid2019usmap] shows a data map and a ranking of coronavirus in the United States with both state-level and county-level details.

  • [covid2019worldmap] shows a data map and a ranking of coronavirus in the whole world.

  • [covid2019stock] shows COVID-19 impact on net income of public companies in stock market of the United States.

  • [covid2019shopping] shows price drop and restock of essential grocery products of the United States.

  • [covid19forecast] shows United States coronavirus forecast in the next few days.

External Services

Our plugin is relying on a 3rd party as a service.

Website:
https://us-coronavirus.info/

Privacy Policy:
https://us-coronavirus.info/privacy-policy.html

If you need a more customized solution, please email us at novelcoronavirus.us@gmail.com for a quote.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload this plugin(unziped) to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place shortcodes in your post or page anywhere you want to show latest coronavirus data, news, maps or forecast.
